co.uk.niadel.mpi.commands

Class CommandRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.command.CommandHandler
      • net.minecraft.command.ServerCommandManager
        • co.uk.niadel.mpi.commands.CommandRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.command.IAdminCommand, net.minecraft.command.ICommandManager

    public final class CommandRegistry
extends net.minecraft.command.ServerCommandManager
    Used to add commands. I don't think Forge does this at all, so plus for N-API :D. If it does, though, it's incredibly well hidden, even for Forge.
    Author:
    Niadel
